sections.heading: Nonparentage as defenseA party whose parentage of a child has been previously determined by or pursuant to law may not plead nonparentage as a defense to a proceeding under this Chapter
sections.text: Acts 1995, No. 251, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1996; Acts 2015, No. 80, ยง1, eff. July 1, 2015.
